p: A549 human lung adenocarcinoma cells were purchased from the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC) (Manassas, VA, USA), while HEK293 human embryonic kidney cells were purchased from Microbix (Mississauga, ON, Canada). Both cell lines were cultured in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (Sigma-Aldrich, St Louis, MO, USA) with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) at 37 °C. The Ad5 isolate we used is named Ad5 wt500, and it was derived by plaque purification by our laboratory from a wild-type Ad5 stock purchased from ATCC. A human Ad6 isolate (Tonsil 99; VR-6) was purchased from ATCC and cultured and purified as described previously [ 33]. The titer of the virus stocks was determined by plaque assay [ 33].
